'''Blubbercream''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Blubbercream is obtained from the [[Mail/New Recipe Rewards (2024-07-18)|New Recipe Rewards]] mail.

Depending on the quality, Blubbercream increases all party members' defense by '''215'''/'''261'''/'''308''' and healing effects by '''6'''/'''8'''/'''10'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
